text: Always enjoyed dropping in and chatting with Marjorie. Excellent selection of masterpieces from Southeast Asia, Indo-China, North and South Asia. She's so willing to help explain her curated pieces. Best!

Singapore's most wonderful art gallery run by the doyenne of Southeast Asian art, Marjorie Chu. She is kind, unpretentious and has the most reasonably priced art in town. Location is beautiful, a heritage shophouse made into a modern Zen retreat.
Great studio with an awesome collection. We bought an old painting we found on the website and couldnâ€™t be happier. We also got a great price.
Let Marjorie take you on a journey through SE Asian art in one of Singapore's longest-running galleries!
Ms. Marjorie is a national treasure , the final word on ArtForum !
